Question: This person married a fellow vaudevillian, chorus girl Harriet "Hattie" Hughes, on April 8, 1900.
Hints: This person made four short subjects for comedy pioneer Mack Sennett in 1932 and 1933, distributed through Paramount Pictures.
Upon discovering the prank, this person was heard to yell, "Who put pineapple juice in my pineapple juice?".
This person was the original choice for the title role in the 1939 version of The Wizard of Oz.
